name: cni-qa-report-fmri
label: CNI: Quality Assurance Report (fMRI)
description: Run QA metrics (displacement, signal spikes) to create a quality assurance report (png) for an fMRI NIfTI using CNI/NIMS code.
author: Robert F. Dougherty, Hua Wu

spike_thresh.description: Z-score threshold for spike detector. [ DEFAULT = 6.0 ]

nskip.description: Number of initial time-points to skip. [ DEFAULT = 6 ]

require_functional.description: Require that the dataset be classified as Intent==Functional. [ DEFAULT = true ]. If true, the gear will exit (0) without attempting to process the data.
